thread.title: Customer. Walter Hanna
thread.title_full: Laguna Pearl reviewed by Customer. Walter Hanna

author: Customer.  Walter Hanna
title: Customer. Walter Hanna
text: Excellent service from this Company. Delivery time was spot on and the Pearls are really lovely. With regards to the Price this company will be hard to beat. I will definitely buy from Laguna Pearl again in the future. Thankful. W.Hanna.
